name: Welcome to my Homepage!
description:
This game was made for Mini Jam 47. The theme was internet and the limitation was everything must die in one hit.

Me and my buddy Mags set out to make a game based on the retro internet, complete with annoying popups, all kinds of viruses and wonderfully gaudy website backgrounds.

Please enjoy!

CREDITS:
Mags - Art
Boffin - Programming, Boss Music
George Stone - Trip through the grand canyon (canyon.mid)
Microsoft - Most of the sound effects
